name: soursop
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large tropical fruit with white flesh and a green skin covered with sharp points, or the tree on which this fruit grows. It is a type of custard apple: Foodies can sample locally grown papayas, mango, soursops, passionfruit and guavas. In Mexico this little tree has been confused with the soursop, although neither foliage nor fruit resembles that.
ALEAIMAGE/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesI opted for a delicious soursop milkshake.The prickly green fruit we know as soursop was tart and refreshing.They are making way for non-traditional exports like soursop and breadfruit.Bajan families come to picnic under the mango, soursop and casuarina trees.
